title: Blinkit SDE2 | Gurgaon
content:
Education: B.E from Tier 1 College (IIT/NIT/BITS/DTU/NSIT)
Years of Experience: 2 years 7 months
Prior Experience:  SDE2 at MNC
Current Comp:- 22.5 Fixed + 5.4 RSU + 4.3 Bonus (32 CTC)
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Blinkit
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 34 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No
Stock bonus: Performance based, after joining
Bonus: 11 LPA every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 45 LPA (Stocks can be added later on top of this, but not mentioned as of now)

What do you guys think, is it a good offer?
salaryTotal: : 45 Lpa (stocks Can Be Added Later On Top Of This, But Not Mentioned As Of Now)

title: JP Morgan | Offer | SE-3 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: B. Tech from tier III
Years of Experience: 5 years 8 Months
Prior Experience: TCS(2 Y) + Brillio (~3 Y) + EY( ~1 Y) All service based
Current Salary : 19 Fixed + 20% of Base as Variable
Company: JP Morgan Chase
Title/Level: SDE - 3
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 32L INR including PF & Gratuity
Signing Bonus: NA(as they agreed for 90 Days NP)
Stock bonus: NA
Bonus: Standard performance bonus 12% of salary every year ~ 3.8 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus ): 32L to 36L(based on performance)
Benefits: Standard JPMC Benefits

Interview experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/6476792/JP-Morgan-or-SE-3-or-Offer-or-Bengaluru

title: Qualcomm | Senior Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in Information Technology (Tier-3)
Years of Experience: 3.5+
Prior Experience: Small startup
Previous comp: 17LPA
Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Qualcomm
Title: Senior Engineer (Software)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 28L
Relocation: 3.25L
Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: $30K stock grant vested over 3 years
Bonus: 9% of salary every year + additional based on performance + $17K bonus stock target
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock + Extras): ~ 45LPA
Benefits: Standard Qualcomm Benefits
Other details: Did not negotiate

Prev offers: https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/6169552/yubi-sse-motive-sde-software-engineer/2792140 + one more 24LPA wfh that I am too lazy to write :|

title: ServiceNow | SSE (IC3) | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.E. in CS
Years of Experience: 7.5
Prior Experience: Mix of startup and Big Tech
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Service Now
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 43L
Retirals: 2.6 PF + 80K Gratuity
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 40K + assisted services
Stock bonus: $80K
Bonus: 4.3L (10% of base)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 67.5L
